Let g be the function given by <math> <semantics> <mtable columnalign="left"> <mtr> <mtd> <mi>g</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>x</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mo>=</mo> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mrow> <msubsup> <mo>∫</mo> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>2</mn> </mrow> <mi>x</mi> </msubsup> <mrow> <mi>f</mi> <mo stretchy="false">(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo stretchy="false">)</mo> <mi>d</mi> <mi>t</mi> </mrow> </mrow> </mstyle> </mtd> </mtr> </mtable> <annotation>MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaacaWGNb GaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaeyypa0Zaa8qmaeaacaWGMbGaaiikaiaa dshacaGGPaGaamizaiaadshaaSqaaiabgkHiTiaaikdaaeaacaWG4b aaniabgUIiYdaakeaaaaaa@443D@</annotation> </semantics> </math>.
content.question: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a horizontal tangent. Determine whether g has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

frqParts.text: Find all values of x on the open interval -6 < x < 3 for which the graph of g has a horizontal tangent. Determine whether g has a local maximum, a local minimum, or neither at each of these values. Justify your answers.

topic.text: 5.4: Using the First Derivative Test to Determine Relative (Local) Extrema

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
